text:
Currently, the import task can only import a file on the filesystem.
It would be very useful if it could import a file from a classpath resource.
This should work very similar to the way taskdefs work with resource, classpath,
and classpathref attributes.

example:
<import resource="testcases/taskdefs/import/imported.xml"
classpath="lib/imports.jar"/>
creator: nospam@sysbliss.com

text:
Created attachment 21377
this patch includes updates to the Import task and tests

This patch includes the update requested... notes:
The import task now contains many of the methods from DefBase.java This is due
to the fact that DefBase extends AntlibDefinition and the Import task should
not.

The test cases look for a jar called imports.jar in the project's lib folder.
The jar just needs to contain testcases/taskdefs/import/imported.xml
